title: Even Now
lyrics:
You say, come ye weary, come and find your rest
In the arms of Mercy, in the One who knows you best
You are good, You are good
Let my heart remember this
Even now, You keep Your promise

Even now, Your heart is kindness

In the dark, I shall not fear

For You are on my side in battle

God, my strength, my shield forever

Where my hope is found

And I will praise You even now!



You say, come, ye broken, bring your burdens here

There's a healing fountain that is flowing deep and clear

'Cause You are good, You are good

My deliverance is near!



Even now, You keep Your promise

Even now, Your heart is kindness

In the dark, I shall not fear

For You are on my side in battle

God, my strength, my shield forever

Where my hope is found

And I will praise You even now!



And in the pain, I will sing

Every tear, an offering

To my God, to my King

Who's redeeming everything!



Even now, You keep Your promise

Even now, Your heart is kindness

In the dark, I shall not fear

For You are on my side in battle

God, my strength, my shield forever

Where my hope is found

On this broken holy ground

I will praise You even now!
